dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Adepi - Departamento de Internet [mailto:adepi.internet@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, November 07, 2006 11:03 AM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: Copyright Infringement
Subject: Copyright Infringement



Dear Everyones Internet

ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who represents the
following motion picture production and distribution companies: 

Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.
Disney Enterprises, Inc.
Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc. 
Paramount Pictures Corporation 
TriStar Pictures, Inc.
Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation 
United Artists Pictures, Inc. 
United Artists Corporation
Universal City Studios, LLLP
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. 


We have received information that you are apparently providing Internet access to
and possibly hosting pirate material at url: 

http://www.toplegendas.com.br <http://www.toplegendas.com.br/>    Ip: 67.15.81.9
<http://67.15.81.9/>  <http://www.4shared.com/dir/1111221/b25f3a3d/sharing.html> 

which is offering subtitles of copyrighted motion picture. The distribution of
unauthorized copies of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright
infringement under the Brazilian Copyright Law # 9610/98 and Criminal Code, section
184. This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law,
and/or treaty obligations. 

The title(s) offered included, but were not limited to:

 

Original Heading: Superman.Returns
Translated Heading: Superman - O Retorno 
Warner Bros

Original Heading: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Mans Chest   
Translated Heading: 
Disney Pictures

Original Heading: World Trade Center   
Translated Heading:  As Torres G
dmca.principal_name: ADEPI (for The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil)
